SELECT fare.fare_id , substring_index(group_concat(route_name), ',', 5) as routes FROM tb_fare_rule fare LEFT JOIN tb_route_fare_mapping mapping on fare.fare_id = mapping.fare_id LEFT JOIN tb_routes route on mapping.route_id = route.route_id WHERE fare.base_yn = 'N'
GROUP BY fare.fare_id

SELECT
FROM tb_fare_rule_task fare WHERE fare.task_id = #{taskId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_fare_rule_task (fare_id, task_id, base_fare, base_dist, youth_fare, child_fare, base_cash_fare, youth_cash_fare, child_cash_fare , unit_fare, unit_dist, max_fare, start_stop_id, end_stop_id, service_id, city_code , base_yn, bus_class, command) VALUES (#{fareId}, #{taskId}, #{baseFare}, #{baseDist}, #{youthFare}, #{childFare}, #{baseCashFare}, #{youthCashFare}, #{childCashFare} , #{unitFare}, #{unitDist}, #{maxFare}, #{startStopId}, #{endStopId}, #{serviceId}, #{cityCode} , #{baseYn}, #{busClass}, #{command})
mapper.select: SELECT city.city_code , city.city_name , rc.bus_class_id as bus_class , rc.bus_class_name , route.route_id , route.route_name , sub.start_point_name , sub.end_point_name FROM tb_routes route , tb_bus_routes_info sub , tb_city_code city , tb_bus_route_class rc , tb_route_fare_mapping mapping WHERE mapping.fare_id = #{fareId} AND route.city_code = city.city_code AND sub.bus_class = rc.bus_class_id AND route.route_id = mapping.route_id AND route.route_id = sub.route_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_fare_rule_mapping_task (task_id, route_id, fare_id) VALUES (#{taskId}, #{routeId}, #{fareId})
